text.title: Non-parole period extended to 43 years for Australian rapist and murderer
text.head: Non-parole period extended to 43 years for Australian rapist and murderer
Sources

list.item: Wayne Flower. "Adrian Bayley, Jill Meaghers killer to serve at least 43 years in jail after 18-year rapes sentence" — Herald Sun , May 28, 2015
"Adrian Bayley's minimum prison term extended by 10 years over three rape convictions" — ABC News (Australia) , May 28, 2015
"Adrian Bayley expected to appeal 18 year sentence for the rape of three more women" — ninemsn , May 28, 2015
